name: Fight On
author: Kyle Wilson

sections.description:
A clone of the popular Hello Dolly plugin. When activated you will see a random lyric from the Western Michigan University Fight Song in the upper right of your admin screen on every page.

Fight on, fight on for Western;
Take the ball, make a score, win the game!
Onward for the Brown and Gold;
Push ‘em back, push ‘em back, bring us fame!
Fight on, fight on for Western;
Over one, over all, we will reign!
Fight, Broncos fight!
Fight with all your might!
Western win this game!

Thanks to Matt Mullenweg for creating the original plugin.
